name: Hope (itch) (Eggsquisite)
description:
Hello! This is a short game about one trying to seek love and hope despite the neverending chaos that is life. Made for Brackeys' 2021.2 "Let there be chaos" jam. 

There isn't quite an ending, but it's about the journey. This is my first attempt at making a more emotional game. HOPE you enjoy it! <3

Controls:

WASD to Move

Escape to Pause

Credits:

Heart Pixel Art by Shlok Gupta

Heartbeat SFX provided by MrSnooze

Music by enrique27naveda from Pixabay

Pixel Speech Bubbles from https://pixelspeechbubble.com/
